question: So today I got to see my daughter I do have gestational diabetes but my sugars have all been under control I am 28 weeks 0 days today and today they did the growth ultrasound and she weighed 2 pounds 15 oz and is measuring 29 weeks and 5 days they aren't changing my due date since its within the two weeks but has this ever happened to you guys and how's the baby I'm in a way glad she is measuring at 29 weeks since I'm a high risk for preterm labor and currently on hospital bed rest
title: Baby's Weight!!!
